Package org.svvrl.goal.core.util

Class XMLUtil

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.util.XMLUtil
public class XMLUtil
extends java.lang.Object
This class provides utility methods for manipulating XML files.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

      Opens an XML file.
      Parameters:
      in - an input of an XML file
      Returns:
      the opened XML document
      Throws:
      org.xml.sax.SAXException - if there is an error in parsing the XML file
      java.io.IOException - if there is an error in reading the XML file

    • encodeProperties

      public static org.w3c.dom.Element encodeProperties​(org.w3c.dom.Document doc, Editable obj)
      Encodes other properties of an editable object as an element in an XML document.
      Parameters:
      doc - an XML document
      obj - an editable object
      Returns:
      an XML element in doc representing other properties of obj

    • decodeProperties

      public static void decodeProperties​(org.w3c.dom.Element e, Editable obj) throws CodecException
      Decodes other properties of an editable object from an XML element.
      Parameters:
      e - an XML element that represents the properties
      obj - an editable object
      Throws:
      CodecException - if e is not well-formed

    • save

      public static void save​(org.w3c.dom.Node node, java.io.OutputStream out, Properties props) throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerFactoryConfigurationError, javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
      Saves an XML node to an output stream.
      Parameters:
      node - an XML node
      out - an output stream
      props - XML output options (may be null)
      Throws:
      javax.xml.transform.TransformerFactoryConfigurationError - if there is an error
      javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - if there is an error
